welcome_message_body: "Welcome to King of Prussia, a charming city known for its rich history and diverse attractions. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including restaurants, shops, and restrooms.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at PHL, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The newest terminal at PHL, serving mostly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A medium-sized terminal at PHL, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: A medium-sized terminal at PHL, serving mostly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The largest terminal at PHL, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
